text: Ostap Markevych (; born 4 April 1978) is a former Ukrainian footballer, futsal player and currently Ukrainian football coach for FC Mariupol. He is a son of a notable Ukrainian coach Myron Markevych.Ostap Markevych: I always dreamt to work in Spain (Остап Маркевич: Всегда мечтал работать в Испании). UA-Football. 27 June 2016 ==Career== He worked as a manager for Villarreal CF. == References == ==External links== * * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Karpaty-2 Lviv players Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:Ukrainian Premier League managers Category:Ukrainian expatriate football managers Category:Expatriate football managers in Spain Category:Ukrainian expatriate sportspeople in Spain Category:FC Ahrobiznes Volochysk managers Category:FC Chornomorets Odesa managers Category:FC Mariupol managers Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Ostap Markevych
